attributes.action: help out young people who do work and don't have the current housing criteria, eg children, benefits etc, with affordable housing in their local area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a full time hard working 20 year old.  I cannot afford a mortgage on my wage.  I live in the Scottish Borders where it is one of the poorest paid areas but with very high house prices.  I work in the Borders therefore I bring revenue in.  I applied for a council and Eildon house however the woman told me "You are not homeless, pregnant or a pensioner, we will see you in 20 years," charming!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
